subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Although its Heisman Trophy rusher Mark Ingram was injured and defensive lineman Marcell Dareus was suspended, the top-ranked Crimson Tide cruised past Penn State.
snippet: Although its Heisman Trophy rusher Mark Ingram was injured and defensive lineman Marcell Dareus was suspended, the top-ranked Crimson Tide cruised past Penn State.
